column2: Ark Restaurants Corp. owns and operates restaurants and bars, fast food concepts and catering operations in the U.S. The company is headquartered in New York City, New York and currently employs 1,328 full-time employees. The firm owned and/or operated 20 restaurants and bars, 19 fast food concepts and catering operations. As of September 29, 2018, five of its restaurant and bar facilities are located in New York City; two are located in Washington, D.C.,; five are located in Las Vegas, Nevada, three are located in Atlantic City, New Jersey,; one is located in the Faneuil Hall Marketplace in Boston, Massachusetts, and two are located on the east coast of Florida and two are located on the gulf coast of Alabama.
